content:
Join us on a journey to make believe worlds with our good friend Mat Ryer. The assignment; we each get to make up a new world where we invent a new gadget and declare a new rule. This episode is sure to delight loyal fans and especially those who enjoy Mat Ryer on the show and a good/bad song or two. :link: https://changelog.am/90

Ch Start Title Runs
01 00:00 Let's talk! 00:38
02 00:38 Sponsor: Depot 02:14
03 02:51 Who's world is it anyways? 03:11
04 06:03 Is it Mat's world? 02:20
05 08:23 Brtis are polite yet cheeky 03:31
06 11:54 A proper visit to Mat's world 09:55
07 21:49 Teleport via Knight Rider 03:39
08 25:28 Mat's laws 02:37
09 28:05 Physics aren't the same either 02:10
10 30:15 Sponsor: Notion 01:42
11 31:58 Let's go to Adam's world 01:58
12 33:56 New rule/law on Adam's world! 06:37
13 40:33 Rocket ship to Jerod's world 01:31
14 42:05 Disincinerator! 03:45
15 45:50 New rules! 05:19
16 51:09 If it tastes good, well it's good for you 05:23
17 56:32 Give us a song Mat! 04:55
18 1:01:27 Favorite Morgan Freeman movie? 03:28
19 1:04:54 UPTICK mineral water 01:09
20 1:06:04 Mat's necklights 02:21
21 1:08:24 Maybe we need another song Mat 03:59
22 1:12:23 Musical outro 00:54
23 1:13:16 Closing thoughts and stuff 01:52

I don’t remember which of you wanted all the rain to fall at once. But the XKCD guy analysed this already and… well… I’ll let you decide if you think it’s a good idea or not

https://what-if.xkcd.com/12/
lol nice I gotta send this to Mat
No idea why this continues to take up room in my head, but champions reminded me of the Comedy Central game show “Beat the Geeks”. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beat_the_Geeks
I'm glad I got the Mitch Hedberg reference immediately. I miss that dude
Was it this the episode where Matt said LLMs can help you feel less lonely when working alone? I really felt that this week as I used Copilot to work through some of my personal projects.
